page.title: 03NEWSAGENTS IN ST.MARTINS
page.content: {Woodcocks}is quite a small corner shop.It sells newspapers,food,toys and fancy goods.It is the{only newsagents in the village of St.Martins.It opens at 7.00.a.m.every day and closes at 5.30.p.m.except on Sunday, when it closes at 12.30.p.m. When people go to work they can buy a newspaper to read at lunchtime. Usually there are one or two part-time people working in the shop. Mrs.Mc.Loughlin,one of the assistants, said she liked her job because she lives locally and it is handy.She only works sixteen hours a week.Before and after school a lot of children buy sweets at{Woodcocks}because it is so near to school.Many elderly people use the shop mainly to have a chat to the assistants because they don't get personal service at the local supermarkets.
